channel.title: My ip ban isnt fully working
channel.description: how do I get my IpBan to work fully, it bans all they account they have made, but you have to kick them on each account for it the ban that account, this gets annoying, so how do I make it work properly?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 10:13:55 AM[/size][hr]do I get a new one?

item.title: My ip ban isnt fully working
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

If you are using testscape, Go to connected from, Then go to one of the guys you want to ban.

Then copy the ip adress. Then go to Data and click on Bannedâ€¦ not banned users. then copy the ip in the Banned. that should make it where they cant log in. if this doesnt work let me know
